hero.description: All the courses you need to start your professional path in one platform at your fingertips. All the courses you need to start your professional path in one platform at your fingertips. All the courses you need to start your professional path in one platform at your fingertips.

scotchBrace.title: Scotch Brace
scotchBrace.subtitle: ROBOTO
scotchBrace.description1: For this project, we chose Scotch Brace as the accent font to convey elegance and sophistication, reflecting the studio's focus on personalized and innovative interior design.
scotchBrace.description2: Roboto was selected for the main text due to its clean, modern look and excellent readability, aligning with the studio's dedication to creating functional and stylish spaces.
scotchBrace.description3: Together, these fonts balance a refined aesthetic with clarity, perfectly representing the studio's blend of creativity and professionalism.

problem_solution.problem_description: The existing landing page failed to effectively showcase the studio's distinctive design approach and extensive experience. It lacked visual appeal and clarity, making it difficult to communicate their personalized service and engage potential clients. This resulted in a less impactful online presence that didn't align with the studio's brand or attract the right audience.
problem_solution.solution_description: The new landing page addresses these issues by prominently featuring the studio's 20+ years of experience and 600+ completed projects. The design combines modern trends with personalized elements to reflect their unique style. Enhanced visuals and focused messaging now clearly communicate the studio's dedication to custom, client-centric interiors, significantly improving their online presence and client engagement.

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description1: At our interior design studio, we create beautiful designs that inspire and truly reflect by blending modern trends with personalized and innovative concepts. We deliver exceptional designs that reflect each client's unique style and personality, ensuring every project fully captures their vision and needs.
about_us.description2: We believe that interior design is an art in which every detail is important. Our team of professionals work with meticulous attention to every nuance, ensuring smooth combination of functionality and aesthetics. Every project becomes a reflection of the client's inner personality, resulting in an environment aligned with your unique tastes and lifestyle.

gallery.description: Our gallery showcases the finest examples of our design work, demonstrating our commitment to excellence and attention to detail in every project we undertake.

homeowners.title: For Homeowners
homeowners.description: You can find everything you need for your renovation or decorating project on Raya Home: Get inspired, find home professionals and discover products to complete your projects.

footer.description: We are a team of strategic creators and digital innovators, united in our focus on pursuing excellence and enjoying the process.

about_hero.title: Welcome to Raya Home
about_hero.description: We provide the best experience for home building, renovation and design, connecting homeowners and home professionals with outstanding resources and vendors.

banner.title: Raya Home started with a house.
banner.paragraph1: When founders Adi Tatarko and Alon Cohen found themselves in the midst of a frustrating renovation experience for their own home, they knew there had to be a better way.
banner.paragraph2: So they built Raya Home. What started as a side project has now grown to a community of more than 70 million homeowners and home design enthusiasts, and over 3 million building, remodeling and design professionals around the world.
banner.paragraph3: As the leading platform for home remodeling and design, Raya Home provides the only all-in-one project management and design solution for industry professionals and tools for homeowners to update their homes from start to finish. Our mission has been the same since day one to provide the best experience for home renovation and design, connecting homeowners and home professionals with the best tools, resources and vendors.

testimonials.name: Eng. Ahmed Hamdy
testimonials.title: Company Founder
testimonials.description: We always try to maintain the balance between what the client wants and the default standards for design and development.

testimonials.name: Eng. Sherif
testimonials.title: Company Founder
testimonials.description: We always focus on designing and developing your work to keep pace with the rapid development in the technical world.

testimonials.name: Eng. Ahmed Hamdy
testimonials.title: Company Founder
testimonials.description: At our company, we all work as one family where we try hard to complete your work as if it were our own.

mission.description: At our company, we provide you with the best and fastest technical solutions in various advertising and technological fields. Relax and hand over your projects to us, and we will take them to the next level.
